basic.description: The role of exercise as a treatment modality will be examined in two chronic diseases with a multicomponent underpinning: chronic pain and mental health. Topics will include the physiological limitations that can be addressed with exercise rehabilitation as well as maintenance of physiological health and wellbeing. (NOTE 1.0 credit unit course.)  EXCLUSION: RHBS-873*
basic.subject: RHBS
basic.title: Exercise Rehabilitation-Multifactor
